column4: the cdrom scans the cd but it acts like theres nothing on the disc when there is
i took it out and put it in my other windows laptop
is this a cd you burned yourself?
what kind of drive is it?
I think cablesm102 meant the laser color. not that that would really help
what options did you use when trying to mount the cd?
specifically, what's the line for you cd drive in fstab?
okay, back up your current fstab and change that line to "/dev/hdc /media/cdrom0 auto ro,user,noauto,exec 0 0"
okay, revert back to your original fstab
what ubuntu version are you on?
that line for your cd in your fstab does it have one or two zeroes at the end?
was that yes to one or yes to two? or were you answering somebody else?
